snippet: If Greg Smith hoped to generate some buzz around his departure from Goldman Sachs, then he succeeded.
abstract: If Greg Smith hoped to generate some buzz around his departure from Goldman Sachs, then he succeeded.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED and ERIC OWLES

headline.main: Goldman Executive's Letter Draws Backers, Detractors and Satirists
headline.print_headline: Goldman Executive’s Resignation Letter Draws Backers, Detractors and Satirists
